input.DevelopmentDescription: 17/00852/FUL Proposed residential development of 11 dwellings.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 15/00305/OUT Granted outline consent for residential development of up to 20 dwellings . 17/00934/OUT for residential development of up to 17 dwellinsg with access (outline) pending decision.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan Policy HC2 (b).
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan, Policy HC2(b).
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 15/00395/FUL Permission granted with conditions for Conversion and alterations of mill to office/light industrial use, and errection of 30 dwellings and associated infrastructure and access.
input.NonHousingDevelopment: Planning permission 15/00395/FUL includes: conversion and alterations of mill to office/light industrial use.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan HC2 (d), strategic site allocation in the Local Plan Policy DS8.
input.NonHousingDevelopment: Of the 58 hectares allocated in Local Plan Policy DS8,  6-8 hectares will be employment land to be determined through the planning application process.
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan Policies HC2 (d) and DS8 Development at this site will extend beyond 2033, assumed completion of circa 800 dwellings 2017-2033.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan HC2 (cc), strategic site allocation DS6.
input.NonHousingDevelopment: Of the 9.46 hectares allocated in Local Plan Policy DS6, 2 hectares will be employment land determined through the planning application process.
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan Policies HC2 (cc) and DS6.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 16/00182/OUT Approval of reserved matters, erection of up to 22 dwellings.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 06/00321/FUL Conversion of former school to residential extra care facility.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
input.SiteNameAddress: St Elphin's Park Dale Road South

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan HC2 (m), strategic site allocation in the Local Plan Policy DS3.
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan Policies HC2 (m) and DS3. Development at this site is recognised as not "deliverable" as defined by paragraph 5, Schedule 2 of the 2017 Brownfield Land Regulations as "there is no reasonable prospect that residential development will take place on the land within 5 years of the entry date, not included in the Local Plan five year housing land supply 2017-22.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 16/00340/OUT Demolition of exsiting buildings and erection of 10 dwellings with access and layout (outline).
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan HC2 (u).
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan Policy HC2 (u).
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan HC2 (y) Part of a larger application for residential development: 16/00923/OUT revised scheme development of 507 dwellings, 2800m2 commercial floorspace(Class B1) shop and cafe - pending decision.
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan Policy HC2 (y).
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
input.SiteNameAddress: "Former Permante Works, West of Cawdor Quarry"

input.DevelopmentDescription: 11/00545/EXF (09/00209.VCOND) Change of use and conversion of mill buildings to provide 22 no. residential apartments (including 6 no. holiday units), office accommodation (Use Class B1), erection of 8 no. dwellings for local needs, business unit (Use Class B1), car parking, open space and associated highway works .
input.NonHousingDevelopment: Planning permission 11/00545/EXF (09/00209.VCOND) includes: office accommodation (Use Class B1), erection of 8 no. dwellings for local needs, business unit (Use Class B1), car parking, open space and associated highway works .
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan HC2 (v), strategic site allocation DS5. 14/00541/OUT Mixed residential and commercial development comprising of 220 dwellings, 400m2 of A3 floorspace (Restaurant and Caf´┐Ż), and 6400m2 of B1 floorspace.
input.NonHousingDevelopment: Of the 27 hectares allocated in Local Plan Policy DS5, 2 hectares will be employment land determined through the planning application process.
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan Policies HC2 (v) and DS5.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan HC2 (dd), strategic site allocation DS7.
input.NonHousingDevelopment: Of the 62 hectares allocated in Local Plan Policy DS7, there will be Use Class B1 Office Accommodation and community facilities, to be determined through the planning application process.
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan Policies HC2 (dd) and DS7. Development at this site will extend beyond 2033, assumed completion of circa 540 dwellings 2017-2033.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan HC2 (aa) 17/00850/FUL Erection of 27 dwellings and widening of existing access to serve development and retained property on site.

input.NonHousingDevelopment: Of the 28 hectares allocated in Local Plan Policy DS9, 1hectare will be employment land determined through the planning application process.
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan Policies HC2 (t) and DS9.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: Housing land allocation in the Local Plan Policy  HC2 (c), strategic site allocation in the Local Plan Policy DS1. 14/00074/OUT Residential development (367 dwellings), employment site, commercial and community facilities, link road, access and landscaping (outline).
input.NonHousingDevelopment: This site forms part of a larger strategic allocation in the Local Plan with approximately 8Ha of employment land, Policy DS1
input.Notes: Allocated in the Local Plan Policies HC2 (c) and DS1.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 16/00700/OUT Demolition of service station buildings and erection of 41 dwellings, access and balancing pond.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 17/00015/FUL Demolition works and conversion of buildings to 7 no. dwellings and erection of 12 further dwellings and associated garages.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 09/00496/FUL Demolition of existing dwelling and outbuildings and redevelopment of site with 14 flats with associated car parking improvement to access and new pedestrian access - Refused. Appeal 10/00015/WREP allowed.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 12/00261/OUT 13/00584/REM Demolition of existing industrial buildings and redevelopment of site for 47 no. residential dwellings and associated access.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 08/00261/FUL Redevelopment of site to include conversion of former textile mill building to create 17 no. residential units, erection of 19 no. new build residential units, erection of 8 no. new build commercial units, 4 no. office units including 6 no. loft apartments, conversion of existing garneting sheds into 4 no. live/craftwork units, erection of 3 no. new build live/craftwork units and 1 no. stand alone craft unit. Conversion of old forge building into cafe/bar/restaurant with B & B accommodation. Demolition of remaining structures, site decontamination works, restoration of watercourses and associated access alterations.
input.NonHousingDevelopment: Planning permission 08/00261/FUL includes:  erection of 19 no. new build residential units, erection of 8 no. new build commercial units, 4 no. office units, conversion of existing garneting sheds into 4 no. live/craftwork units, erection of 3 no. new build live/craftwork units and 1 no. stand alone craft unit. Conversion of old forge building into cafe/bar/restaurant with B & B accommodation. Demolition of remaining structures, site decontamination works, restoration of watercourses and associated access alterations.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

input.DevelopmentDescription: 08/00286/FUL Redevelopment of site to provide 5 no. detached dwellings, 5 no. residential apartments, associated access and landscaping.
input.OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
